body: Ive got a 3 day tempban and i really dont know what to do on this point. The weekend is coming and im kinda stressed right now and i really dont play anything else as avicus. Do you guys have any pvp server to play on?!?
body_tagged: Ive got a 3 day tempban and i really dont know what to do on this point. The weekend is coming and im kinda stressed right now and i really dont play anything else as avicus. Do you guys have any pvp server to play on?!?
title: How to survive without avicus??????

replies.body: Chill out, play some sport, just take a break from the game
replies.body_tagged: Chill out, play some sport, just take a break from the game

replies.body:
There are plenty, do a Google search.

Another helpful tip is to do something creative. You'll be amazed how boredom can really bring out creativity.
replies.body_tagged:
There are plenty, do a Google search.

Another helpful tip is to do something creative. You'll be amazed how boredom can really bring out creativity.

replies.body:
Watch the Lord of the Rings: Extended Edition, that should take up 1 day alone. 
Watch a CSGO tourney this weekend, play frisbee, adopt a dog, find buried treasure, go to China, throw a surprise party. Those are just a few suggestions! :)

replies.body: I suggest that you do something different like going outside and playing something. You can't spend your life on Minecraft =P
replies.body_tagged: I suggest that you do something different like going outside and playing something. You can't spend your life on Minecraft =P

replies.body:
The weekends feel a lot longer if you do exercise at around 8am and finish by 9am. Then read, go outside, listen to music or do all three at once.           ¯\_(ツ)_/¯   Using electronics suck up time a lot quicker than you'd think and you loose an hour or so without noticing. Watch a movie or some T.V shows from 5pm onwards when it starts to get dark. 

Spending time on a game just for the sake of it is pointless so don't feel forced to play, just because you're banned for a few days.

Just chill.
replies.body_tagged:
The weekends feel a lot longer if you do exercise at around 8am and finish by 9am. Then read, go outside, listen to music or do all three at once.           ¯\_(ツ)_/¯   Using electronics suck up time a lot quicker than you'd think and you loose an hour or so without noticing. Watch a movie or some T.V shows from 5pm onwards when it starts to get dark. 

Spending time on a game just for the sake of it is pointless so don't feel forced to play, just because you're banned for a few days.

Just chill.

Trust me, if you're stressed it's definitely going to help!
